site.description: Xdoc is a domain specific language for documenting eclipse plugins. It is based on Xtext and is able to create eclipse help plugins as well as PDF files.

category-def.name: xdoc.features
category-def.label: Xdoc
category-def.description: Xdoc is a domain specific language for documenting eclipse plugins. It is based on Xtext and is able to create eclipse help plugins as well as PDF files.
